display_long_description:
Hello Wordsmiths! Looking for a thought-provoking, grey matter-activating puzzle game that combines the best parts of crossword puzzles and Wordle? Prepare to test your mind and challenge your vocabulary with the hottest mixed reality word game for Meta Quest, **Wordomi!**      
                                                                                                                                                                                         
[media]

# PUZZLE FANTASTIC GAMEPLAY
**Wordomi** is packed full of puzzle challenges thanks to its randomly generated word sequences. Prepare to face 200+ challenges across 100+ levels with multiple difficulties!

[media]

# PLAY YOUR WAY
In mixed reality mode, you can see the world and carry on a conversation while playing **Wordomi**. Or shun those boring friends and family and immerse yourself in a zen virtual space!

[media]

#  MODES FOR DAYS
Classic mode, Subgram mode, Theme mode and Word of the Day, you’ll never need another word game again!

# EVEN MORE VALUE!
- Handy hand tracking support
- 120Hz support for buttery smooth words
- Gorgeous full color passthrough on Quest 3/3S & Quest Pro
- Relax your mind in Zen mode
- Achievements!

[media]
